revision.text:
'''Spawn numbers''' are the numbers used by specials such as [[Thing_Spawn]] to spawn [[Classes|actors]] in the game once the user has started playing the map. This is a list of available spawn numbers, along with the thing's Identifier. You can also use the Identifier name instead of the spawn number if you are running Thing Spawn from a script.
Note: Two of these constants have a different name in DEFS.ACS. If converting an old script from COMMON.ACS to ZCOMMON.ACS, make sure to change T_DEMON to T_DEMON1 and T_GREENKEY to T_EMERALDKEY.
T_NONE 0 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for ZDoom spawnable, same value. T_CENTAUR 1 T_CENTAURLEADER 2 T_DEMON1 3 // Note: Renamed from T_DEMON to avoid conflict with Doom spawnable with value 8. T_ETTIN 4 T_FIREGARGOYLE 5 T_WATERLURKER 6 T_WATERLURKERLEADER 7 T_WRAITH 8 T_WRAITHBURIED 9 T_FIREBALL1 10 T_MANA1 11 T_MANA2 12 T_ITEMBOOTS 13 T_ITEMEGG 14 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_ITEMFLIGHT 15 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_ITEMSUMMON 16 T_ITEMTPORTOTHER 17 T_ITEMTELEPORT 18 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_BISHOP 19 T_ICEGOLEM 20 T_BRIDGE 21 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for ZDoom spawnable, same value. T_DRAGONSKINBRACERS 22 T_ITEMHEALTHPOTION 23 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_ITEMHEALTHFLASK 24 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_ITEMHEALTHFULL 25 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_ITEMBOOSTMANA 26 T_FIGHTERAXE 27 T_FIGHTERHAMMER 28 T_FIGHTERSWORD1 29 T_FIGHTERSWORD2 30 T_FIGHTERSWORD3 31 T_CLERICSTAFF 32 T_CLERICHOLY1 33 T_CLERICHOLY2 34 T_CLERICHOLY3 35 T_MAGESHARDS 36 T_MAGESTAFF1 37 T_MAGESTAFF2 38 T_MAGESTAFF3 39 T_MORPHBLAST 40 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_ROCK1 41 T_ROCK2 42 T_ROCK3 43 T_DIRT1 44 T_DIRT2 45 T_DIRT3 46 T_DIRT4 47 T_DIRT5 48 T_DIRT6 49 T_ARROW 50 T_DART 51 T_POISONDART 52 T_RIPPERBALL 53 T_STAINEDGLASS1 54 T_STAINEDGLASS2 55 T_STAINEDGLASS3 56 T_STAINEDGLASS4 57 T_STAINEDGLASS5 58 T_STAINEDGLASS6 59 T_STAINEDGLASS7 60 T_STAINEDGLASS8 61 T_STAINEDGLASS9 62 T_STAINEDGLASS0 63 T_BLADE 64 T_ICESHARD 65 T_FLAME_SMALL 66 T_FLAME_LARGE 67 T_MESHARMOR 68 T_FALCONSHIELD 69 T_PLATINUMHELM 70 T_AMULETOFWARDING 71 T_ITEMFLECHETTE 72 T_ITEMTORCH 73 // Duplicated in ZDefs.ACS for Heretic spawnable, same value. T_ITEMREPULSION 74 T_MANA3 75 T_PUZZSKULL 76 T_PUZZGEMBIG 77 T_PUZZGEMRED 78 T_PUZZGEMGREEN1 79 T_PUZZGEMGREEN2 80 T_PUZZGEMBLUE1 81 T_PUZZGEMBLUE2 82 T_PUZZBOOK1 83 T_PUZZBOOK2 84 T_METALKEY 85 T_SMALLMETALKEY 86 T_AXEKEY 87 T_FIREKEY 88 T_EMERALDKEY 89 // Note: Renamed from T_GREENKEY to avoid conflict with Heretic spawnable with value 86. T_MACEKEY 90 T_SILVERKEY 91 T_RUSTYKEY 92 T_HORNKEY 93 T_SERPENTKEY 94 T_WATERDRIP 95 T_TEMPSMALLFLAME 96 T_PERMSMALLFLAME 97 T_TEMPLARGEFLAME 98 T_PERMLARGEFLAME 99 T_DEMON_MASH 100 T_DEMON2_MASH 101 T_ETTIN_MASH 102 T_CENTAUR_MASH 103 T_THRUSTSPIKEUP 104 T_THRUSTSPIKEDOWN 105 T_FLESH_DRIP1 106 T_FLESH_DRIP2 107 T_SPARK_DRIP 108
